body:
Hey, I decided to make some small Avicus Map Quizzes.
These are just for fun, but maybe I can add some rewards for the winners later on ;)

How does it work?
I put some simple questions in a list, together with some images. You have to try and get all answers right.

Quizlist:
1. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1umdyCk4MYheshkySiVpVkSzmyW1XzdiBUrdL_TzTV1Q
2. Coming soon...

Winners:
1. Xuph and profbananaslug (24 / 24 Points)
2. Coming soon...

Good luck and have fun!

replies.body:
I tried to think of a hard question, because I felt the rest was too easy :P I'm gonna make more for sure, because people seem to like it.
Not gonna lie though, out of the 24 participants so far only 2 answered all correctly (maybe you?) ;)

replies.body:
Avicus Map Game 1
Winners: Xuph and profbananaslug
Average points: 16.6 / 24
Lowest score: 6 (3 players)
Highest score: 24 (2 players)
Most scored amount: 22 (4 players)
Question with the most correct answers: Which map has 1 monument behind spawn and looks like a desert? (96.3% answered it right)
Question with the most incorrect answers: Which 2 maps are authored by Acytlon? (Option 1: 44.4%, Option 2: 29.6%)

Thanks for participating!
You can still try it if you didn't yet ;)
Answers: http://issuu.com/clijmart/docs/avicus_map_game_1
